about_the_game:
This is a story where you play as a holy knight and a Nun from a fictional religious order of knights. You both were requested to come to this castle in Romania for a royal event, which turned into a crusade of vampires from another dimension. You must rescue all the royal family from different type of blood-eaters like: Skeletons, Ghouls, Large bats, lesser vampires, Hellhounds, Werewolfs, Wraiths, Incubus, Succubus, Bi-Incubus Devils, Greater vampire and their cult of human followers.

Enemies with a detection system:
Enemies have a certain field of view and the players can see when the enemy is able to see them, To avoid getting detected, players will be able to sneak past. After chasing for a while enemy can get tired/forget about you if you manage to loose their sight.

Combat System:
Enemies chase players until out of sight, but if not able to escape, Equip your weapon and fight back!

Ragdoll system:
All characters will get ragdolled upon defeat.

About the development process

This game is being developed by a single person. The goal is to keep the development cost minimum by making everything in-house instead of buying assets from store. Because of that, it has taken over 2 years to learn all the skills related to game development and marketing. Have been working solo for over 2 years now.

Going forward, after this game will be finished, future games will be coming out faster. This game is just 1st out of the many stories which are linked with each other and goal is to keep them all priced as low as possible so everyone can afford to play them.

The game is already well optimized to run on low end PCs since first 1.5 years of development was done on a RX580 graphics card.

Feel free to join the discord server where u can apply to be a Play tester.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 5th Gen, Ryzen 5 2nd gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 630
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: Made to run on older devices.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD second Gen Ryzen and Beyond.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 1660ti and Beyond
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: Made to run on older devices.

short_description: The year is 1869. You play as a holy knight and a Nun from a fictional religious order of knights. Both of you were requested to come to this castle in Romania for a royal event, which turned into a crusade of vampires from another dimension. You must now stop the Crusade and save everyone!
